meta.name: Event Pastel Card – High-Level Design DNA
meta.source: Derived from attached pastel event card reference (job opening layout)
meta.purpose: Guide AI to recreate the pastel, soft, rounded event/job cards used in the app.

principles: Use a strict 4px scale; default paddings 12–20px inside cards.
Rely on whitespace and pastel fills instead of heavy dividers.
Group related tiles in soft rounded containers; keep gaps consistent (10–12px).

fontFamilies.primary: var(--font-inter), Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, sans-serif
fontFamilies.headline: Poppins, var(--font-inter), system-ui, sans-serif

usage: Headlines are bold, tight, and concise (1–2 lines max).
Body text is calm and readable; captions handle meta labels.
Avoid all-caps; use sentence case and bold weights for emphasis.

usageRules: Primary surfaces use pastel fills (e.g., sage, blush) with no visible shadows.
Text uses ink/inkSecondary for contrast on pastel backgrounds.
Pills and chips use rgba(primaryRgb, 0.10–0.18) or neutral tints; avoid dark borders.

shadowsAndDepth.layering: Depth via stacked pastel surfaces and spacing; avoid drop shadows.

usage: Micro interactions: scale(0.98–0.99) on press; subtle hover tint.
No springy overshoot; keep transitions soft and brief.

Card.background: pastel (e.g., sage) or white for nested tiles
Card.layout: Vertical stack with 12–16px gaps; meta row, title, actions.

StatusBadge.iconDot: semantic color (e.g., danger for closed, success for open)

do: Use pastel fills and pill shapes for every interactive/control element.
Keep typography bold for titles and calm for meta; prioritize readability.
Group related stats in evenly spaced tiles with consistent radii.
Avoid hard shadows; create depth with layering and spacing.
dont: Avoid heavy borders or dark outlines.
Avoid sharp corners; maintain rounded geometry.
Avoid clutter; keep sections short and separated by whitespace.

cssVariables: Use existing --color-primary and --color-primary-rgb; derive pastel tints with rgba(primary-rgb, 0.1–0.18).
Set card background via contextual pastel: sage (#D7E2BE) or neutrals (#F4F7F5).
layoutPatterns: Wrap card content in 16px padding; use 12–16px gaps between rows.
Use pill buttons for status/actions and circular CTA for overflow/plus.
interaction: Hover: slight tint; Active: scale(0.98–0.99); Focus: subtle outline rgba(primary-rgb, 0.2).
No drop shadows; rely on color contrast for hierarchy.
